greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n>=2} ((-1)^n)/(log(n)^n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: RealDigits[ Sum[ N[(-1)^n/Log[n]^n, 128], {n, 2, 160}], 10, 111][[1]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 21 2004 *)
program: (MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(100)); [(&+[(-1)^k/Log(k)^k: k in [2..1000]])]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 20 2018
(Sage) numerical_approx(sum((-1)^k/log(k)^k for k in [2..1000]), digits=100) # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 20 2018
results.author: Mark Hudson (mrmarkhudson(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 02 2004
